name: Sharp X Mind
description:
Sharp X Mind is a controversial game based on a first-person story that focuses on the madness of Mr Fish.

Prepare yourself for a cutting journey with intense katana fighting and help Mr. Fish free himself from the evil spirit in his mind.




  • Intense intrigue that takes place in an infected mind
  • Body cutting in real time in intense katana fights
  • Many NPCs to interact and chat with
  • 50+ movies and shows accessible via theater, nightclub, freak show...
  • Immersive and atmospheric soundtrack
  • Powerful voice-overs
  • Supporting 5 different languages
